answers.answer: Depends on the cause.  Retinal edema from diabetes or vein occlusions responds well Avastin, Lucentis, or Eylea injections.For CME after cataract surgery starts with steroid drops and an NSAID and progress to injections if the drops do not help.Dr. O.
Thanks. No known cause other than I had cateract surgery 4 years ago.
